For offshore processing

Refugees arrving by boat should be processed offshore

These divisions relate to the policy “for offshore processing”. Compare how a supporter of the policy would have voted to the division outcome.

14th Mar 2013 – Senate Motions — Renewable Energy Certificates - Division No. 1

Supporters vote “No (strong)”

6th Dec 2006, 7:29 PM – Representatives Prohibition of Human Cloning for Reproduction and the Regulation of Human Embryo Research Amendment Bill 2006 - Consideration in Detail - Division No. 3

Supporters vote “No”
